title: Corki's Voice is being changed?
body:
https://youtu.be/wpTLGIe8iEY?t=3m13s

So in the tabletop game tutorial video, Corki speaks with a new voice? New voiceover?

The Tristana and Rumble interaction is just adorable. I take it back, all the interactions are just adorable in this video

replies.body:
So this is actually a Rioter.

Enter: Cactopus. A writer and by no means a professional voice actor. The dude just loves him some Corki and Kades had gotten wind that he did a mean impression. We were setting up to do a scratch recording session of a bunch of Rioters for all the champs in the game. I sit down at the mix console. Kades is just behind me (having already done his own version of Rumble). Cactopus steps up to the mic and I give him the old "Alrighty, first line, I'm rolling."

Voice acting is a really challenging task for performers. You have to emote entirely with your voice, you have to hit a character and feeling just right, and beyond that you just need a convincing performance.

The second he got done with that first line I turned around and looked at Kades and he had the exact same look that I did, like "What...? That was awesome." To my knowledge he'd never even really mentioned he had the ability...
Please inform him that I will be calling him Corktipus from now on because of this.
Corki's body, with Illaoi's tentacles, and Cactopus' face. Riot's photoshoppers shall be busy...

> [{quoted}](name=Riot TreblMuffin,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=JUmh9daj,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-20T01:05:51.175+0000)
>
> So this is actually a Rioter.
> 
> Enter: Cactopus. A writer and by no means a professional voice actor. The dude just loves him some Corki and Kades had gotten wind that he did a mean impression. We were setting up to do a scratch recording session of a bunch of Rioters for all the champs in the game. I sit down at the mix console. Kades is just behind me (having already done his own version of Rumble). Cactopus steps up to the mic and I give him the old "Alrighty, first line, I'm rolling."
> 
> Voice acting is a really challenging task for performers. You have to emote entirely with your voice, you have to hit a character and feeling just right, and beyond that you just need a convincing performance.
> 
> The second he got done with that first line I turned around and looked at Kades and he had the exact same look that I did, like "What...? That was awesome." To my knowledge he'd never even really mentioned he had the ability...

He did a fantastic job! If it's possible in the future I would be so happy to see him be the new voice actor. The lines themselves gave a deeper look into how Corki would speak outside of pilot lingo which was really exciting. Nothing but hope for the future!


Please tell Cactopus he did great. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
You guys need him to voice some new lines for Corki in-game! It isn't every day you find someone in the office that could make for a quick update for a champion!
Does he really sound so different?His regular VO has a filter over it,so it might sound different because of that.

English is not my first language so unless accents are heavily marked I hear no difference... that being said, I never knew Corki had a southern accent and I've been hearing him talk since the game was released ._.

when he says: that just goes to show you you're nothing but a whiskey delta. He doesn't sound like a farmer, he sounds like an old guy riding on a plane, the difference is huge, even for me :S
Might just be that they couldn't get the original voice actor.  Although if that were his new voice, I honestly wouldn't mind.
I feel like this is, for the most part, and for now, just the voice actor whom they will use when they get to do a VGU for our good ol' Corki.
